description: Creates new objects in batch. To achieve optimum performance when adding more than one object, use this API. Note: "ignore-errors" and "ignore-warnings" cannot be used in this API, errors and warnings are ignored and operation will apply changes while ignoring errors. It is not possible to publish changes that contain validations errors. You must use the "show-validations" API to see any validation errors and warnings caused by the batch creation. Note: "set-if-exists" cannot be used in this API.Batch supported types: access-role, address-range, application-site-category, application-site-group, dns-domain, dynamic-object, group, group-with-exclusion, host, lsv-profile, multicast-address-range, network, package, security-zone, service-dce-rpc, service-group, service-icmp, service-other, service-sctp, service-tcp, service-udp, tacacs-server, tacacs-group, tag, time, time-group, vpn-community-meshed, vpn-community-star, wildcard.

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Send JSON object to use the API Web Services

headers.name: X-chkp-sid
headers.description: Session unique identifier as it returned by the login request

body.name: type
body.description: Type of objects to be created. Only types from above are supported. Important: the hyphen between "address" and "range" must be included in the syntax.

body.name: list
body.description: List of objects from the same type to be created. Use the "add" API reference documentation for a single object command to find the expected fields for the request. For example: to add hosts, use the "add-host" command found in the API reference documentation (under Network Objects). Note: "Set-if-exists", "ignore-errors", "ignore-warnings" and "details-level" options are not supported when adding a batch of objects.

success.name: task-id
success.description: Batch task UID. Use show-task command to check the progress of the task.

failure.name: current-session
failure.description: Validation related to the current session.

failure.name: current-session
failure.description: Validation related to the current session.

failure.name: current-session
failure.description: Validation related to the current session.

add objects-batch.description: Add two hosts and two address ranges
